name: Flame of Destruction
entries: At 15th level, you can conjure a powerful flame of destruction and all of your fires burn with a destructive fury. You learn the investiture of flame spell and can cast it once without expending a spell slot.

In addition, once per turn when you deal fire damage to a creature that creature must make a Constitution saving throw or have disadvantage on the next attack roll or ability check they make before the end of their next turn.
